title: Senior Wireless PHY Standards Architect
summary: As a Senior Wireless PHY Standards Architect, you will be responsible for driving and designing the next generation of physical layer for wireless technologies...
description: Participate, contribute novel PHY technical concepts and ideas, influence, and generate consensus around company strategic interests in wireless standards organizations Simulate PHY system level performance using simulation tools, such as MATLAB or C/C++, to validate PHY system performance of internal and external technical contributions Analyze standards contributions to understand performance benefits, implementation complexity, and architecture and design tradeoffs Work closely with internal teams to communicate standards development and direction, and develop alignment on standards strategy with company priorities Define high-level PHY layer specifications requirements for internal teams Develop, propose, and simulate innovative proprietary PHY algorithms and cross-layer systems for new and emerging applications Design innovative PHY/MAC cross-layer algorithms to achieve robust performance in all environments Work with cross-functional teams to innovate and achieve best-in-class product performance
key_qualifications: Proven track record of participation and technical leadership in wireless standardization organization, strong familiarity with PHY algorithms and architectures of wireless standards, in-depth knowledge on wireless communication systems, architectures, protocols and algorithms, in-depth knowledge of wireless communication techniques, deep understanding of communication theory and signal processing, strong analytical and problem-solving skills, experience with MATLAB or C/C++ for modeling and simulations, experience with PHY modem architecture, algorithms, and hardware design, experience with PHY/MAC cross-layer algorithm design, ability to present complex technical concepts in a clear and organized manner, strong and proven leadership ability, ability to work closely with and drive cross-functional teams, self-motivated and passionate to solve problems in innovative ways
education_experience: BS degree in a technical discipline with minimum 10 years of relevant experience.
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $175,800 and $312,200, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location. Apple employees also have the opportunity to become an Apple shareholder through participation in Apple’s discretionary employee stock programs...
